import React, { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import Spinner from '../layout/Spinner'; import webSocket from 'socket.io-client'; const Chat = () => { const [ws, setWs] = useState(null); const [msg, setMsg] = useState(''); const connectWebSocket = () => { //開啟 setWs(webSocket('http://localhost:8888')); }; useEffect(() => { ws == null && connectWebSocket(); if (ws) { //連線成功在 console 中打印訊息 console.log('success connect!'); console.log('ws id: ' + ws.id); //設定監聽 initWebSocket(); } }, [ws]); const initWebSocket = () => { //對 getMessage 設定監聽，如果 server 有透過 getMessage 傳送訊息，將會在此被捕捉 ws.on('getMessage', (message) => { console.log(message); }); }; const sendMessage = () => { //以 emit 送訊息，並以 getMessage 為名稱送給 server 捕捉 ws != null && ws.emit('getMessage', { user: 'Andrew', to: 'Nicole', msg: msg }); setMsg(''); }; return (
